title: Two Bedroom, Two Bathroom apartment for rent++
posting_body: Two Bedroom, Two Bathroom apartment for rent.
Located just outside of downtown, Kohls and all the downtown restaurants, bars and shopping.
Private off street parking and on street available.
1st Floor unit with one big master bedroom with walk in closet, small second bedroom, large living room, large dining room & office as well as a kitchen and bathroom.
Landlord pays water, sewer, trash, snow removal and grass mowing.
Landlord  pays heat, electric and cable/internet.
Must pass criminal background, credit check, previous landlord checks, income verification and other background checks.
Unit is unfurnished and has gas heat.
